This looks like errors in the third-party tomcat plug-in that you have installed.

Specifically, it is causing the NPE and NoSuchMethod errors.

It looks like com.sysdeo.eclipse.tomcat is causing the problems. Eclipse does
not ship with this. Please contact the owner of this plug-in.
